statements: SELECT * FROM trade_reconciliations;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_reconciliations;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_date, trade_quantity FROM trade_reconciliations;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, external_source FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE trade_quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_date, trade_symbol FROM trade_reconciliations ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price, external_source FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC, trade_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE trade_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;

SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price, trade_date, external_source FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE trade_price < 50.00 AND (trade_date > '2022-01-01' OR trade_symbol = 'AAPL') ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE trade_symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT') AND trade_quantity >= 500 ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC, trade_symbol ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, external_source FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE trade_date <= '2022-02-28' AND external_source LIKE '%Trade%' ORDER BY trade_date ASC, trade_symbol DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_qty, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100.00;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_qty FROM trades WHERE trade_qty < 1000;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM external_data WHERE data_source = 'NASDAQ' ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_qty FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100.00;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_qty, trade_price FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(trade_price), MIN(trade_price), AVG(trade_price) FROM trades WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_source, SUM(data_qty) FROM external_data GROUP BY data_source HAVING SUM(data_qty) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy';
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_amount FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_date, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT s.source_name, r.status, t.trade_amount FROM trades t JOIN reconciliations r ON t.trade_id = r.trade_id JOIN external_sources s ON r.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_type='Buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount FROM trades INNER JOIN reconciliations ON trades.trade_id = reconciliations.trade_id WHERE reconciliations.status='Pending'
SELECT trade_date, trade_type FROM trades WHERE trade_amount > 10000 ORDER BY trade_date ASC
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM external_sources WHERE source_type='Data Feed'

SELECT trade_id, trade_amount, reconciliation_date FROM trades INNER JOIN reconciliations ON trades.trade_id = reconciliations.trade_id WHERE reconciliations.status='Completed' ORDER BY reconciliation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM external_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC, data_date ASC
SELECT id, source_name, data_value FROM external_sources WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT id, source_name, data_date FROM external_sources WHERE source_name = 'Source A' ORDER BY data_date DESC
SELECT * FROM trade_reconciliations ORDER BY status ASC, reconciliation_date DESC
SELECT trade_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM trade_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT source_name, data_value FROM external_sources WHERE data_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, source_name, data_date FROM external_sources WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_reconciliations WHERE status = 'Pending' AND reconciliation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM trade_transactions WHERE trade_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT error_id, error_description FROM trade_errors WHERE error_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount, trader_name FROM trade_orders;
SELECT * FROM external_data WHERE source_name = 'Supplier A';
SELECT order_id, order_amount FROM trade_orders ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_log WHERE result_status = 'failed';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount, trader_name FROM trade_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM trade_orders;
SELECT order_id, trader_name, order_amount FROM trade_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT external_id, external_date, source_name FROM external_data WHERE external_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_log WHERE result_status = 'error' ORDER BY reconciled_datetime ASC;
SELECT t.trader_name, e.source_name FROM trade_orders t JOIN external_data e ON t.order_id = e.external_id;
